title: SQL Developer (Healthcare experience)
job_desc:
The SQL Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining SQL-based databases and ensuring the smooth operation of healthcare-related data systems. This role requires a strong understanding of healthcare data structures, Electronic Health Records (EHR), and claims data, along with expertise in SQL programming to support data analytics, reporting, and business intelligence initiatives within the healthcare environment.



Tasks and Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with management and end users to identify reporting requirements
  • Design, develop, and maintain SQL queries, stored procedures, views, and triggers to support data extraction and reporting requirements in a healthcare environment
  • Develop and optimize complex SQL queries to ensure high performance and efficient data retrieval for clinical, operational, and financial reporting
  • Ensure data integrity, consistency, and quality by performing routine data validation and reconciliation tasks
  • Maintain and troubleshoot healthcare databases, ensuring compliance with healthcare standards and regulatory requirements (e.g., HIPAA)
  • Collaborate with data analysts and business intelligence teams to integrate data from various healthcare systems (EHR, claims, clinical databases) into reporting systems and data warehouses
  • Work with healthcare-specific data models (e.g., HL7, ICD-10, CPT codes) to ensure data is stored, transformed, and reported accurately
  • Develop and maintain custom SQL reports to support operational, clinical, and financial decision-making
  • Create dashboards and data visualizations to provide actionable insights into key healthcare metrics, such as patient outcomes, cost efficiency, and quality of care
  • Work closely with the analytics team to provide data for predictive modeling, trend analysis, and decision-making processes
  • Collaborate with healthcare administrators, clinical staff, and business analysts to understand data requirements and translate them into database solutions
  • Provide expertise in SQL and database design to other departments and offer technical support for data-related issues
  • Ensure clear and effective communication regarding project status, database performance, and any issues that may impact reporting or analytics
  • Ensure all database-related processes are in compliance with healthcare regulations, including HIPAA and other patient privacy laws
  • Assist in implementing security best practices to protect sensitive healthcare data, ensuring data encryption, access control, and audit trails are in place
  • Continuously monitor and optimize SQL queries and database performance to improve speed and efficiency, particularly in large-scale healthcare data environments
  • Participate in ongoing training and development to keep up with new database technologies, healthcare regulations, and best practices in data management



Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in information technology, computer science, or a related field
  • Minimum of three (3) years of experience as an SQL Developer, with a strong focus on healthcare data management and reporting
  • Minimum two (2) years of experience in database development, programming, data management, and reporting
  • Must have a stable employment history
  • Familiarity with data warehousing concepts and tools, including data extraction and transformation
  • Understanding of healthcare industry regulations, including HIPAA and patient data privacy standards
  • Work independently and exercise judgement on decision making and issue resolution
  • Navigate competing priorities and effectively work in a fast-paced environment
  • Identify and execute opportunities for improvement
  • Exhibit growth mindset and team-orientated behaviors



Work Location: WFH (within Philippines only)

Work Schedule: 10 PM - 7 AM, Monday to Friday, PH time

  • Overtime Pay

  • HMO
